   19: %% % @format
   20: %%
   21: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
   22: %%% Purpose: Test suite for the 'json' module.
   23: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   24: 
   25: -module(json_SUITE).
   26: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   27: 
   28: %% Test server specific exports
   29: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0, init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2]).
   30: 
   31: %% Test cases must be exported.
   32: -export([
   33:     test_encode_atom/1,
   34:     test_encode_integer/1,
   35:     test_encode_float/1,
   36:     test_encode_binary/1,
   37:     test_encode_map/1,
   38:     test_encode_list/1,
   39:     test_encode_proplist/1,
   40:     test_encode_escape_all/1,
   41:     test_decode_atoms/1,
   42:     test_decode_numbers/1,
   43:     test_decode_strings/1,
   44:     test_decode_arrays/1,
   45:     test_decode_objects/1,
   46:     test_decode_whitespace/1,
   47:     test_decode_api/1,
   48:     test_json_test_suite/1,
   49:     counterexamples/1,
   50:     property_string_roundtrip/1,
   51:     property_integer_roundtrip/1,
   52:     property_float_roundtrip/1,
   53:     property_object_roundtrip/1,
   54:     property_escape_all/1
   55: ]).
   56: 
   57: suite() ->
   58:     [
   59:         {ct_hooks, [ts_install_cth]},
   60:         {timetrap, {minutes, 4}}
   61:     ].
   62: 
   63: all() ->
   64:     [
   65:         {group, encode},
   66:         {group, decode},
   67:         test_json_test_suite,
   68:         {group, properties},
   69:         counterexamples
   70:     ].
   71: 
   72: groups() ->
   73:     [
   74:         {encode, [parallel], [
   75:             test_encode_atom,
   76:             test_encode_integer,
   77:             test_encode_float,
   78:             test_encode_binary,
   79:             test_encode_map,
   80:             test_encode_list,
   81:             test_encode_proplist,
   82:             test_encode_escape_all
   83:         ]},
   84:         {decode, [parallel], [
   85:             test_decode_atoms,
   86:             test_decode_numbers,
   87:             test_decode_strings,
   88:             test_decode_arrays,
   89:             test_decode_objects,
   90:             test_decode_whitespace,
   91:             test_decode_api
   92:         ]},
   93:         {properties, [parallel], [
   94:             property_string_roundtrip,
   95:             property_integer_roundtrip,
   96:             property_float_roundtrip,
   97:             property_object_roundtrip,
   98:             property_escape_all
   99:         ]}
  100:     ].
  101: 
  102: init_per_group(properties, Config) ->
  103:     %% this works well in init_per_group as well as per suite
  104:     %% we only want to skip this group, if the tool is not found
  105:     ct_property_test:init_per_suite(Config);
  106: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
  107:     Config.
  108: 
  109: end_per_group(_, _Config) -> ok.
  110: 
  111: %%
  112: %% Encoding tests
  113: %%
  114: 
  115: test_encode_atom(_Config) ->
  116:     ?assertEqual(<<"true">>, encode(true)),
  117:     ?assertEqual(<<"false">>, encode(false)),
  118:     ?assertEqual(<<"null">>, encode(null)),
  119:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"json\"">>, encode(json)),
  120:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"‚òÉa\""/utf8>>, encode('‚òÉa')).
  121: 
  122: test_encode_integer(_Config) ->
  123:     ?assertEqual(<<"123">>, encode(123)),
  124:     ?assertEqual(<<"-123">>, encode(-123)),
  125:     ?assertEqual(<<"0">>, encode(0)).
  126: 
  127: test_encode_float(_Config) ->
  128:     ?assertEqual(<<"0.0">>, encode(0.0)),
  129:     ?assertEqual(<<"-0.0">>, encode(-0.0)),
  130:     ?assertEqual(<<"99.99">>, encode(99.99)),
  131:     ?assertEqual(<<"9.9e100">>, encode(9.9e100)),
  132:     ?assertEqual(<<"9.9e-100">>, encode(9.9e-100)).
  133: 
  134: test_encode_binary(_Config) ->
  135:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"hello world\"">>, encode(<<"hello world">>)),
  136:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"hello\\nworld\"">>, encode(<<"hello\nworld">>)),
  137:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\nhello\\nworld\\n\"">>, encode(<<"\nhello\nworld\n">>)),
  138: 
  139:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\\"\"">>, encode(<<"\"">>)),
  140:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\\\\"">>, encode(<<"\\">>)),
  141:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\b\"">>, encode(<<"\b">>)),
  142:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\f\"">>, encode(<<"\f">>)),
  143:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\n\"">>, encode(<<"\n">>)),
  144:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\r\"">>, encode(<<"\r">>)),
  145:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\t\"">>, encode(<<"\t">>)),
  146:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\u0000\"">>, encode(<<"\0">>)),
  147:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\u001F\"">>, encode(<<"\x1F">>)),
  148: 
  149:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"/\"">>, encode(<<"/">>)),
  150: 
  151:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"√°√©√≠√≥√∫√†√®√¨√≤√π√¢√™√Æ√¥√ª√£·∫Ωƒ©√µ≈©\""/utf8>>, encode(<<"√°√©√≠√≥√∫√†√®√¨√≤√π√¢√™√Æ√¥√ª√£·∫Ωƒ©√µ≈©"/utf8>>)),
  152:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"‚òÉa\""/utf8>>, encode(<<"‚òÉa"/utf8>>)),
  153: 
  154:     ?assertError({unsupported_type, <<0:1>>}, encode(<<0:1>>)),
  155: 
  156:     %% invalid 1st byte
  157:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xa0}, encode(<<"\xa0\xa1">>)),
  158: 
  159:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\xc3\xb1\"">>, encode(<<"\xc3\xb1">>)),
  160:     %% invalid 2nd octet in 2-byte sequence
  161:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, encode(<<"\xc3\x28">>)),
  162: 
  163:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\xe2\x82\xa1\"">>, encode(<<"\xe2\x82\xa1">>)),
  164:     %% invalid 2nd octet in 3-byte sequence
  165:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, encode(<<"\xe2\x28\xa1">>)),
  166:     %% invalid 3rd octet in 3-byte sequence
  167:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, encode(<<"\xe2\x82\x28">>)),
  168: 
  169:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\xf0\x90\x8c\xbc\"">>, encode(<<"\xf0\x90\x8c\xbc">>)),
  170:     %% invalid 2nd octet in 4-byte sequence
  171:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, encode(<<"\xf0\x28\x8c\xbc">>)),
  172:     %% invalid 3rd octet in 4-byte sequence
  173:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, encode(<<"\xf0\x90\x28\xbc">>)),
  174:     %% invalid 4th octet in 4-byte sequence
  175:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, encode(<<"\xf0\x28\x8c\x28">>)),
  176: 
  177:     %% too-long sequences
  178:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xf8}, encode(<<"\xf8\xa1\xa1\xa1\xa1">>)),
  179:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xfc}, encode(<<"\xfc\xa1\xa1\xa1\xa1\xa1">>)),
  180: 
  181:     %% overlong
  182:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xc0}, encode(<<"\xc0\x80">>)),
  183:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x80}, encode(<<"\xe0\x80\x80">>)),
  184:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x80}, encode(<<"\xf0\x80\x80\x80">>)),
  185: 
  186:     %% surrogate halves
  187:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xa0}, encode(<<"\xed\xa0\x80">>)),
  188:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xaf}, encode(<<"\xed\xaf\xbf">>)),
  189:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xb0}, encode(<<"\xed\xb0\x80">>)),
  190:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xbf}, encode(<<"\xed\xbf\xbf">>)).
  191: 
  192: test_encode_escape_all(_Config) ->
  193:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\u2603a\"">>, encode_escape_all('‚òÉa')),
  194:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\u2603a\"">>, encode_escape_all(<<"‚òÉa"/utf8>>)),
  195:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\uD834\\uDD1Eb\"">>, encode_escape_all(<<"ùÑûb"/utf8>>)),
  196: 
  197:     %% because of how /utf8 works, we always report 1st byte as invalid
  198: 
  199:     %% invalid 1st byte
  200:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xa0}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xa0\xa1">>)),
  201: 
  202:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\u00F1\"">>, encode_escape_all(<<"\xc3\xb1">>)),
  203:     %% invalid 2nd octet in 2-byte sequence
  204:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xc3}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xc3\x28">>)),
  205: 
  206:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\u20A1\"">>, encode_escape_all(<<"\xe2\x82\xa1">>)),
  207:     %% invalid 2nd octet in 3-byte sequence
  208:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xe2}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xe2\x28\xa1">>)),
  209:     %% invalid 3rd octet in 3-byte sequence
  210:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xe2}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xe2\x82\x28">>)),
  211: 
  212:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\uD800\\uDF3C\"">>, encode_escape_all(<<"\xf0\x90\x8c\xbc">>)),
  213:     %% invalid 2nd octet in 4-byte sequence
  214:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xf0}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xf0\x28\x8c\xbc">>)),
  215:     %% invalid 3rd octet in 4-byte sequence
  216:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xf0}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xf0\x90\x28\xbc">>)),
  217:     %% invalid 4th octet in 4-byte sequence
  218:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xf0}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xf0\x28\x8c\x28">>)),
  219: 
  220:     %% too-long sequences
  221:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xf8}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xf8\xa1\xa1\xa1\xa1">>)),
  222:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xfc}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xfc\xa1\xa1\xa1\xa1\xa1">>)),
  223: 
  224:     %% overlong
  225:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xc0}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xc0\x80">>)),
  226:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xe0}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xe0\x80\x80">>)),
  227:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xf0}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xf0\x80\x80\x80">>)),
  228: 
  229:     %% surrogate halves
  230:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xed}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xed\xa0\x80">>)),
  231:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xed}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xed\xaf\xbf">>)),
  232:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xed}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xed\xb0\x80">>)),
  233:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xed}, encode_escape_all(<<"\xed\xbf\xbf">>)).
  234: 
  235: test_encode_map(_Config) ->
  236:     ?assertEqual(<<"{}">>, encode(#{})),
  237:     ?assertEqual(<<"{\"foo\":\"bar\"}">>, encode(#{<<"foo">> => <<"bar">>})),
  238:     ?assertEqual(<<"{\"foo\":\"bar\"}">>, encode(#{foo => bar})),
  239:     ?assertEqual(<<"{\"42\":\"bar\"}">>, encode(#{42 => bar})),
  240: 
  241:     MultiKeyMap = #{<<"foo">> => <<"foo1">>, foo => <<"foo2">>},
  242:     ?assertError({duplicate_key, <<"foo">>}, encode_checked(MultiKeyMap)),
  243:     ?assertEqual(<<"{\"foo\":\"foo2\",\"foo\":\"foo1\"}">>, encode(MultiKeyMap)).
  244: 
  245: test_encode_list(_Config) ->
  246:     ?assertEqual(<<"[]">>, encode([])),
  247:     ?assertEqual(<<"[1,2,3]">>, encode([1, 2, 3])).
  248: 
  249: test_encode_proplist(_Config) ->
  250:     ?assertError({unsupported_type, {a, 1}}, encode([{a, 1}])),
  251:     ?assertEqual(<<"{\"a\":1}">>, encode_proplist([{a, 1}])),
  252: 
  253:     MultiKeyProplist = [{<<"foo">>, <<"foo1">>}, {foo, <<"foo2">>}],
  254:     ?assertError({duplicate_key, foo}, encode_proplist_checked(MultiKeyProplist)),
  255:     ?assertEqual(<<"{\"foo\":\"foo1\",\"foo\":\"foo2\"}">>, encode_proplist(MultiKeyProplist)).
  256: 
  257: encode(Term) -> iolist_to_binary(json:encode(Term)).
  258: 
  259: encode_escape_all(Term) ->
  260:     Encode = fun
  261:         (Binary, _) when is_binary(Binary) -> json:encode_binary_escape_all(Binary);
  262:         (Other, Encode) -> json:encode_value(Other, Encode)
  263:     end,
  264:     iolist_to_binary(json:encode(Term, Encode)).
  265: 
  266: encode_checked(Term) ->
  267:     Encode = fun
  268:         (Map, Encode) when is_map(Map) -> json:encode_map_checked(Map, Encode);
  269:         (Other, Encode) -> json:encode_value(Other, Encode)
  270:     end,
  271:     iolist_to_binary(json:encode(Term, Encode)).
  272: 
  273: encode_proplist(Term) ->
  274:     Encode = fun
  275:         ([{_, _} | _], Encode) -> json:encode_key_value_list(Term, Encode);
  276:         (Other, Encode) -> json:encode_value(Other, Encode)
  277:     end,
  278:     iolist_to_binary(json:encode(Term, Encode)).
  279: 
  280: encode_proplist_checked(Term) ->
  281:     Encode = fun
  282:         ([{_, _} | _], Encode) -> json:encode_key_value_list_checked(Term, Encode);
  283:         (Other, Encode) -> json:encode_value(Other, Encode)
  284:     end,
  285:     iolist_to_binary(json:encode(Term, Encode)).
  286: 
  287: %%
  288: %% Decoding tests
  289: %%
  290: 
  291: test_decode_atoms(_Config) ->
  292:     ?assertEqual(true, decode(<<"true">>)),
  293:     ?assertEqual(false, decode(<<"false">>)),
  294:     ?assertEqual(null, decode(<<"null">>)).
  295: 
  296: test_decode_numbers(_Config) ->
  297:     ?assertError(unexpected_end, decode(<<"-">>)),
  298:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $-}, decode(<<"--1">>)),
  299:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $1}, decode(<<"01">>)),
  300:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $.}, decode(<<".1">>)),
  301:     ?assertError(unexpected_end, decode(<<"1.">>)),
  302:     ?assertError(unexpected_end, decode(<<"1e">>)),
  303:     ?assertError(unexpected_end, decode(<<"1.0e+">>)),
  304:     ?assertError({unexpected_sequence, <<"1.0e999">>}, decode(<<"1e999">>)),
  305: 
  306:     ?assertEqual(0, decode(<<"0">>)),
  307:     ?assertEqual(1, decode(<<"1">>)),
  308:     ?assertEqual(0, decode(<<"-0">>)),
  309:     ?assertEqual(-1, decode(<<"-1">>)),
  310:     ?assertEqual(0.0, decode(<<"0.0">>)),
  311:     ?assertEqual(-0.0, decode(<<"-0.0">>)),
  312:     ?assertEqual(0.1, decode(<<"0.1">>)),
  313:     ?assertEqual(-0.1, decode(<<"-0.1">>)),
  314:     ?assertEqual(0.0, decode(<<"0e0">>)),
  315:     ?assertEqual(0.0, decode(<<"0E0">>)),
  316:     ?assertEqual(1.0, decode(<<"1e0">>)),
  317:     ?assertEqual(1.0, decode(<<"1E0">>)),
  318:     ?assertEqual(1.0, decode(<<"1.0e0">>)),
  319:     ?assertEqual(1.0, decode(<<"1e+0">>)),
  320:     ?assertEqual(1.0, decode(<<"1.0e+0">>)),
  321:     ?assertEqual(0.1e1, decode(<<"0.1e1">>)),
  322:     ?assertEqual(0.1e-1, decode(<<"0.1e-1">>)),
  323:     ?assertEqual(99.99e99, decode(<<"99.99e99">>)),
  324:     ?assertEqual(-99.99e-99, decode(<<"-99.99e-99">>)),
  325:     ?assertEqual(123456789.123456789e123, decode(<<"123456789.123456789e123">>)).
  326: 
  327: test_decode_strings(_Config) ->
  328:     ?assertError(unexpected_end, decode(<<"\"">>)),
  329:     ?assertError(unexpected_end, decode(<<"\"\\\"">>)),
  330:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $k}, decode(<<"\"\\k\"">>)),
  331:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\r}, decode(<<"\"a\r\"">>)),
  332:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x80}, decode(<<"\"\x80\"">>)),
  333:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x1F}, decode(<<"\"\x1F\"">>)),
  334:     ?assertError(unexpected_end, decode(<<"\"\\u2603\\\"">>)),
  335:     ?assertError(unexpected_end, decode(<<"\"Here's a snowman for you: ‚òÉ. Good day!"/utf8>>)),
  336:     ?assertError(unexpected_end, decode(<<"\"ùÑû"/utf8>>)),
  337:     ?assertError({unexpected_sequence, <<"\\ud8aa\\udcxx">>}, decode(<<"\"\\ud8aa\\udcxx\"">>)),
  338:     ?assertError({unexpected_sequence, <<"\\ud8aa\\uda00">>}, decode(<<"\"\\ud8aa\\uda00\"">>)),
  339:     ?assertError({unexpected_sequence, <<"\\uxxxx">>}, decode(<<"\"\\uxxxx\"">>)),
  340: 
  341:     ?assertEqual(<<"\"\\/\b\f\n\r\t">>, decode(<<"\"\\\"\\\\\\/\\b\\f\\n\\r\\t\"">>)),
  342:     ?assertEqual(<<"‚òÉ"/utf8>>, decode(<<"\"\\u2603\"">>)),
  343:     ?assertEqual(<<"\x{2028}\x{2029}"/utf8>>, decode(<<"\"\\u2028\\u2029\"">>)),
  344:     ?assertEqual(<<"ùÑû"/utf8>>, decode(<<"\"\\uD834\\uDD1E\"">>)),
  345:     ?assertEqual(<<"ùÑû"/utf8>>, decode(<<"\"\\ud834\\udd1e\"">>)),
  346:     ?assertEqual(<<"ÌûôÌûô"/utf8>>, decode(<<"\"\\uD799\\uD799\"">>)),
  347:     ?assertEqual(<<"‚úî"/utf8>>, decode(<<"\"‚úî\""/utf8>>)),
  348: 
  349:     %% test-case with & without \n to test copying & non-copying implementation
  350: 
  351:     %% invalid 1st byte
  352:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xa0}, decode(<<"\"\xa0\xa1\"">>)),
  353:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xa0}, decode(<<"\"\\n\xa0\xa1\"">>)),
  354: 
  355:     ?assertEqual(<<"\xc3\xb1">>, decode(<<"\"\xc3\xb1\"">>)),
  356:     ?assertEqual(<<"\n\xc3\xb1">>, decode(<<"\"\\n\xc3\xb1\"">>)),
  357:     %% invalid 2nd octet in 2-byte sequence
  358:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, decode(<<"\"\xc3\x28\"">>)),
  359:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, decode(<<"\"\\n\xc3\x28\"">>)),
  360: 
  361:     ?assertEqual(<<"\xe2\x82\xa1">>, decode(<<"\"\xe2\x82\xa1\"">>)),
  362:     ?assertEqual(<<"\n\xe2\x82\xa1">>, decode(<<"\"\\n\xe2\x82\xa1\"">>)),
  363:     %% invalid 2nd octet in 3-byte sequence
  364:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, decode(<<"\"\xe2\x28\xa1\"">>)),
  365:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, decode(<<"\"\\n\xe2\x28\xa1\"">>)),
  366:     %% invalid 3rd octet in 3-byte sequence
  367:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, decode(<<"\"\xe2\x82\x28\"">>)),
  368:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, decode(<<"\"\\n\xe2\x82\x28\"">>)),
  369: 
  370:     ?assertEqual(<<"\xf0\x90\x8c\xbc">>, decode(<<"\"\xf0\x90\x8c\xbc\"">>)),
  371:     ?assertEqual(<<"\n\xf0\x90\x8c\xbc">>, decode(<<"\"\\n\xf0\x90\x8c\xbc\"">>)),
  372:     %% invalid 2nd octet in 4-byte sequence
  373:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, decode(<<"\"\xf0\x28\x8c\xbc\"">>)),
  374:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, decode(<<"\"\\n\xf0\x28\x8c\xbc\"">>)),
  375:     %% invalid 3rd octet in 4-byte sequence
  376:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, decode(<<"\"\xf0\x90\x28\xbc\"">>)),
  377:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, decode(<<"\"\\n\xf0\x90\x28\xbc\"">>)),
  378:     %% invalid 4th octet in 4-byte sequence
  379:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, decode(<<"\"\xf0\x28\x8c\x28\"">>)),
  380:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x28}, decode(<<"\"\\n\xf0\x28\x8c\x28\"">>)),
  381: 
  382:     %% too-long sequences
  383:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xf8}, decode(<<"\"\xf8\xa1\xa1\xa1\xa1\"">>)),
  384:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xf8}, decode(<<"\"\\n\xf8\xa1\xa1\xa1\xa1\"">>)),
  385:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xfc}, decode(<<"\"\xfc\xa1\xa1\xa1\xa1\xa1\"">>)),
  386:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xfc}, decode(<<"\"\\n\xfc\xa1\xa1\xa1\xa1\xa1\"">>)),
  387: 
  388:     %% overlong
  389:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xc0}, decode(<<"\"\xc0\x80\"">>)),
  390:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xc0}, decode(<<"\"\\n\xc0\x80\"">>)),
  391:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x80}, decode(<<"\"\xe0\x80\x80\"">>)),
  392:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x80}, decode(<<"\"\\n\xe0\x80\x80\"">>)),
  393:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x80}, decode(<<"\"\xf0\x80\x80\x80\"">>)),
  394:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\x80}, decode(<<"\"\\n\xf0\x80\x80\x80\"">>)),
  395: 
  396:     %% surrogate halves
  397:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xa0}, decode(<<"\"\xed\xa0\x80\"">>)),
  398:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xa0}, decode(<<"\"\\n\xed\xa0\x80\"">>)),
  399:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xaf}, decode(<<"\"\xed\xaf\xbf\"">>)),
  400:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xaf}, decode(<<"\"\\n\xed\xaf\xbf\"">>)),
  401:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xb0}, decode(<<"\"\xed\xb0\x80\"">>)),
  402:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xb0}, decode(<<"\"\\n\xed\xb0\x80\"">>)),
  403:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $\xbf}, decode(<<"\"\xed\xbf\xbf\"">>)).
  404: 
  405: test_decode_arrays(_Config) ->
  406:     ?assertError(unexpected_end, decode(<<"[">>)),
  407:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $,}, decode(<<"[,">>)),
  408:     ?assertError(unexpected_end, decode(<<"[1,">>)),
  409: 
  410:     ?assertEqual([], decode(<<"[]">>)),
  411:     ?assertEqual([1, 2, 3], decode(<<"[1,2,3]">>)),
  412:     ?assertEqual([<<"foo">>, <<"bar">>, <<"baz">>], decode(<<"[\"foo\", \"bar\", \"baz\"]">>)),
  413:     ?assertEqual([#{<<"foo">> => <<"bar">>}], decode(<<"[{\"foo\":\"bar\"}]">>)).
  414: 
  415: test_decode_objects(_Config) ->
  416:     ?assertError(unexpected_end, decode(<<"{">>)),
  417:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $,}, decode(<<"{,">>)),
  418:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $}}, decode(<<"{\"foo\"}">>)),
  419:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $}}, decode(<<"{\"foo\":}">>)),
  420:     ?assertError({invalid_byte, $}}, decode(<<"{\"foo\":1,}">>)),
  421: 
  422:     ?assertEqual(#{}, decode(<<"{}">>)),
  423:     ?assertEqual(#{<<"foo">> => <<"bar">>}, decode(<<"{\"foo\": \"bar\"}">>)),
  424:     ?assertEqual(#{<<"foo">> => <<"bar">>}, decode(<<"{\"foo\" : \"bar\"}">>)),
  425:     ?assertEqual(#{<<"foo">> => #{}}, decode(<<"{\"foo\":{}}">>)),
  426:     ?assertEqual(#{<<"foo">> => []}, decode(<<"{\"foo\":[]}">>)),
  427:     ?assertEqual(#{<<"foo">> => 1, <<"bar">> => 2}, decode(<<"{\"foo\":1,\"bar\":2}">>)).
  428: 
  429: test_decode_whitespace(_Config) ->
  430:     ?assertError(unexpected_end, decode(<<"">>)),
  431:     ?assertError(unexpected_end, decode(ews(<<" ">>))),
  432: 
  433:     ?assertEqual([], decode(ews(<<" [ ] ">>))),
  434:     ?assertEqual(#{}, decode(ews(<<" { } ">>))),
  435:     ?assertEqual([1, 2], decode(ews(<<" [ 1 , 2 ] ">>))),
  436:     ?assertEqual(#{<<"foo">> => 1, <<"bar">> => 2}, decode(ews(<<" { \"foo\" : 1 , \"bar\" : 2 } ">>))).
  437: 
  438: %% add extra whitespace
  439: ews(Str) ->
  440:     unicode:characters_to_binary(string:replace(Str, <<" ">>, <<" \s\t\r\n">>)).
  441: 
  442: test_decode_api(_Config) ->
  443:     put(history, []),
  444:     ArrayStart = set_history1(array_start, fun({_, Int}) ->
  445:         {[], Int + 1}
  446:     end),
  447:     ArrayPush = set_history2(array_push, fun(Val, {Acc, Int}) ->
  448:         {[Val | Acc], Int + 1}
  449:     end),
  450:     ArrayFinish = set_history2(array_finish, fun({Acc, Int}, {OldAcc, _OldInt}) ->
  451:         {lists:reverse(Acc), {OldAcc, Int + 1}}
  452:     end),
  453:     ObjectStart = set_history1(object_start, fun({_, Int}) ->
  454:         {[], Int + 1}
  455:     end),
  456:     ObjectPush = set_history3(object_push, fun(Key, Val, {Acc, Int}) ->
  457:         {[{Key, Val} | Acc], Int + 1}
  458:     end),
  459:     ObjectFinish = set_history2(object_finish, fun({Acc, Int}, {OldAcc, _OldInt}) ->
  460:         {maps:from_list(Acc), {OldAcc, Int + 1}}
  461:     end),
  462:     Float = set_history1(float, fun binary_to_float/1),
  463:     Integer = set_history1(integer, fun binary_to_integer/1),
  464:     String = set_history1(string, fun binary_to_atom/1),
  465:     Decoders = #{
  466:         array_start => ArrayStart,
  467:         array_push => ArrayPush,
  468:         array_finish => ArrayFinish,
  469:         object_start => ObjectStart,
  470:         object_push => ObjectPush,
  471:         object_finish => ObjectFinish,
  472:         float => Float,
  473:         integer => Integer,
  474:         string => String,
  475:         null => nil
  476:     },
  477: 
  478:     Data = <<"{\"a\": [[], {}, true, false, null, {\"foo\": \"baz\"}], \"b\": [1, 2.0, \"three\"]}">>,
  479:     {Decoded, Acc, <<>>} = json:decode(Data, {[], 0}, Decoders),
  480:     ?assertEqual({[], 24}, Acc),
  481:     Expected = #{a => [[], #{}, true, false, nil, #{foo => baz}], b => [1, 2.0, three]},
  482:     ?assertEqual(Expected, Decoded),
  483:     ExpectedHistory =
  484:         [
  485:             {object_start, {[], 0}, {[], 1}},
  486:             {string, <<"a">>, a},
  487:             {array_start, {[], 1}, {[], 2}},
  488:             {array_start, {[], 2}, {[], 3}},
  489:             {array_finish, {{[], 3}, {[], 2}}, {[], {[], 4}}},
  490:             {array_push, {[], {[], 4}}, {[[]], 5}},
  491:             {object_start, {[[]], 5}, {[], 6}},
  492:             {object_finish, {{[], 6}, {[[]], 5}}, {#{}, {[[]], 7}}},
  493:             {array_push, {#{}, {[[]], 7}}, {[#{}, []], 8}},
  494:             {array_push, {true, {[#{}, []], 8}}, {[true, #{}, []], 9}},
  495:             {array_push, {false, {[true, #{}, []], 9}}, {[false, true, #{}, []], 10}},
  496:             {array_push, {nil, {[false, true, #{}, []], 10}}, {[nil, false, true, #{}, []], 11}},
  497:             {object_start, {[nil, false, true, #{}, []], 11}, {[], 12}},
  498:             {string, <<"foo">>, foo},
  499:             {string, <<"baz">>, baz},
  500:             {object_push, {foo, baz, {[], 12}}, {[{foo, baz}], 13}},
  501:             {object_finish, {{[{foo, baz}], 13}, {[nil, false, true, #{}, []], 11}},
  502:                 {#{foo => baz}, {[nil, false, true, #{}, []], 14}}},
  503:             {array_push, {#{foo => baz}, {[nil, false, true, #{}, []], 14}}, {
  504:                 [#{foo => baz}, nil, false, true, #{}, []], 15
  505:             }},
  506:             {array_finish, {{[#{foo => baz}, nil, false, true, #{}, []], 15}, {[], 1}},
  507:                 {[[], #{}, true, false, nil, #{foo => baz}], {[], 16}}},
  508:             {object_push, {a, [[], #{}, true, false, nil, #{foo => baz}], {[], 16}}, {
  509:                 [{a, [[], #{}, true, false, nil, #{foo => baz}]}], 17
  510:             }},
  511:             {string, <<"b">>, b},
  512:             {array_start, {[{a, [[], #{}, true, false, nil, #{foo => baz}]}], 17}, {[], 18}},
  513:             {integer, <<"1">>, 1},
  514:             {array_push, {1, {[], 18}}, {[1], 19}},
  515:             {float, <<"2.0">>, 2.0},
  516:             {array_push, {2.0, {[1], 19}}, {[2.0, 1], 20}},
  517:             {string, <<"three">>, three},
  518:             {array_push, {three, {[2.0, 1], 20}}, {[three, 2.0, 1], 21}},
  519:             {array_finish, {{[three, 2.0, 1], 21}, {[{a, [[], #{}, true, false, nil, #{foo => baz}]}], 17}},
  520:                 {[1, 2.0, three], {[{a, [[], #{}, true, false, nil, #{foo => baz}]}], 22}}},
  521:             {object_push, {b, [1, 2.0, three], {[{a, [[], #{}, true, false, nil, #{foo => baz}]}], 22}}, {
  522:                 [{b, [1, 2.0, three]}, {a, [[], #{}, true, false, nil, #{foo => baz}]}], 23
  523:             }},
  524:             {object_finish, {{[{b, [1, 2.0, three]}, {a, [[], #{}, true, false, nil, #{foo => baz}]}], 23}, {[], 0}},
  525:                 {#{a => [[], #{}, true, false, nil, #{foo => baz}], b => [1, 2.0, three]}, {[], 24}}}
  526:         ],
  527:     ?assertEqual(ExpectedHistory, lists:reverse(get(history))).
  528: 
  529: set_history1(Ty, Fun) ->
  530:     fun(Arg) -> set_history(Ty, Arg, Fun(Arg)) end.
  531: 
  532: set_history2(Ty, Fun) ->
  533:     fun(Arg1, Arg2) -> set_history(Ty, {Arg1, Arg2}, Fun(Arg1, Arg2)) end.
  534: 
  535: set_history3(Ty, Fun) ->
  536:     fun(Arg1, Arg2, Arg3) -> set_history(Ty, {Arg1, Arg2, Arg3}, Fun(Arg1, Arg2, Arg3)) end.
  537: 
  538: set_history(Ty, Acc, Res) ->
  539:     History = get(history),
  540:     Entry = {Ty, Acc, Res},
  541:     put(history, [Entry | History]),
  542:     Res.
  543: 
  544: decode(Bin) -> json:decode(Bin).
  545: 
  546: %%
  547: %% JSON SUITE tests
  548: %%
  549: 
  550: test_json_test_suite(Config) ->
  551:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  552:     TestFiles = filelib:wildcard("*.json", DataDir),
  553:     Checker = fun(File) ->
  554:         Type = test_type(File),
  555:         {ok, Data} = file:read_file(filename:join(DataDir, File)),
  556:         test_file(Type, File, Data)
  557:     end,
  558:     lists:foreach(Checker, TestFiles).
  559: 
  560: test_type("y_" ++ _) -> yes;
  561: test_type("n_" ++ _) -> no;
  562: test_type("i_number_double_huge_neg_exp.json") -> yes;
  563: test_type("i_number_real_underflow.json") -> yes;
  564: test_type("i_number_too_big_neg_int.json") -> yes;
  565: test_type("i_number_too_big_pos_int.json") -> yes;
  566: test_type("i_number_very_big_negative_int.json") -> yes;
  567: test_type("i_structure_500_nested_arrays.json") -> yes;
  568: test_type("i_" ++ _) -> no.
  569: 
  570: test_file(yes, File, Data) ->
  571:     Parsed = decode(Data),
  572:     ?assertEqual(Parsed, decode(iolist_to_binary(encode(Parsed))), File);
  573: test_file(no, File, Data) ->
  574:     ?assertError(_, decode(Data), File).
  575: 
  576: %%
  577: %% Property tests
  578: %%
  579: 
  580: property_string_roundtrip(Config) ->
  581:     ct_property_test:quickcheck(json_prop:prop_string_roundtrip(), Config).
  582: 
  583: property_integer_roundtrip(Config) ->
  584:     ct_property_test:quickcheck(json_prop:prop_integer_roundtrip(), Config).
  585: 
  586: property_float_roundtrip(Config) ->
  587:     ct_property_test:quickcheck(json_prop:prop_float_roundtrip(), Config).
  588: 
  589: property_object_roundtrip(Config) ->
  590:     ct_property_test:quickcheck(json_prop:prop_object_roundtrip(), [{numtests, 250} | Config]).
  591: 
  592: property_escape_all(Config) ->
  593:     ct_property_test:quickcheck(json_prop:prop_escape_all(), Config).
  594: 
  595: counterexamples(_Config) ->
  596:     Value = [[], 0],
  597:     ?assertEqual(Value, decode_io(encode(Value))).
  598: 
  599: decode_io(IOList) -> decode(iolist_to_binary(IOList)).
